attributes.action: Provide specialist education for autistic children following exclusion.
attributes.additional_details: Due to spontaneous outbursts of aggression due to anxiety&frustration he, like many others has been excluded from mainstream schools&permanently excluded from in County&out of County provisions. Due to lack of experience&appropriate restraint training etc no specialist placements will take him. He's home 24/7 with no education, no support/respite for him or family. Many children&families being failed in UK. A child kept from school = parents in Court, however no law to provide. Double standards
attributes.background: My son is one of many who is being failed by the system. He is 13yrs old and has High Functioning Aspergers and Challenging Behaviour. The law states ALL children have a legal right to edcuation. However, does not provide this following exclusion and has no law on specific minimum requirements.
